Terry Noonan returns home to New York's Hells Kitchen
after a ten year absence. He soon hooks up with
childhood pal Jackie who is involved in the Irish mob
run by his brother Frankie. Terry also rekindles an
old flame with Jackie's sister Kathleen. Soon, however,
Terry is torn between his loyalty to his friends and
his loyalties to others.
